cat.lump.aq.wikilink.config

Class MySQLWikiConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.wikilink.config.MySQLWikiConfiguration

  • public abstract class MySQLWikiConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle the connection variables to the database. The information is extracted from lump_wiki.properties
    TODO Should we create a Configuration class with the "default" data (such as username, password, url, etc) and extend it to include Wikipedia-related info?
    Author:
    albarron
